channel.title: 志謙's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on 志謙's Blog

item.title: All I've got to do is pass as an ordinary human
item.description:
Still, she’s got a lot of spirit. I don’t know, what do you think? Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid. I can’t get involved! I’ve got work to do! It’s not that I like the Empire, I hate it, but there’s nothing I can do about it right now. It’s such a long way from here.

I care. So, what do you think of her, Han?

I suggest you try it again, Luke. This time, let go your conscious self and act on instinct. You are a part of the Rebel Alliance and a traitor! Take her away! Your eyes can deceive you. Don’t trust them.

item.title: 研究經歷
item.description:
Academic Thesis

  • Hsieh, C. C. and Hsu, F. J. (2018). A firm’s financial risk and tax avoidance behavior. Master’s thesis, Department of Insurance and Finance, National Taichung University of Science and Technology, Taichung, Taiwan.

Research Presentations

  • Hsu, F. J., Chen, S. H., and Hsieh, C. C. (2020). Sweet candy or bitter poison: The default risk under US Federal Reserve’s quantitative easing. The International Conference on Innovative Computing and Management Science (ICMS 2020), July 29, 2020, Yilan, Taiwan.
  • Hsu, F. J., Chen, S. H., and Hsieh, C. C. (2020). Corporate financial risk, financial market conditions, and firm’s tax avoidance behavior. The International Conference on Innovative Computing and Management Science (ICMS 2020), July 29, 2020, Yilan, Taiwan.
  • Hsu, F. J., and Hsieh, C. C. (2018). Financial risk and tax avoidance. The 21st Conference of Finance Theory and Practice, May 30, 2018, Taichung, Taiwan.
  • Hsu, F. J., and Hsieh, C. C. (2018). Macroeconomic conditions and firm’s tax avoidance behavior. The Annual Conference of Modern Accounting Literature Association, May 4, 2018, Taichung, Taiwan.

Research Projects

  • 以巨量探勘與科研能量為基礎之我國金融科技架構發展(1/2)，科技部計畫編號 MOST 106-2634-F-025-001-，計畫參與人員，執行期間 2017/07/01–2018/06/30。

item.title: 聯絡我
item.description:
如果你有任何問題，或是想要交流，可以透過 email 與我聯繫。

Email: twcch1218 [at] gmail.com

item.title: 關於我
item.description: My name is Chih-Chien Hsieh. I’m a Ph.D. student in the Department of Engineering Science (Computer Science and Applications Division) at National Cheng Kung University. I’m a member of the Data Science and Computational Thinking Laboratory, supervised by Prof. Mu-Yen Chen. My expertise includes machine learning, deep learning, big data analytics, and financial risk modeling. My current research focuses on detecting corporate financial risk and fraud using advanced machine learning and data mining techniques.
